titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: OUTCOME OF ASSESSMENT UP TO AND INCLUDING OPEN BIOPSY CANCER DIAGNOSED TOTAL - Description

div.p: OUTCOME OF ASSESSMENT UP TO AND INCLUDING OPEN BIOPSY CANCER DIAGNOSED TOTAL is the total number of women who have a REFERRAL REQUEST for Biopsy with a PATHOLOGY INVESTIGATION TYPE FOR BREAST SCREENING recorded as National Code 'Diagnostic Surgery for Histology (Open Biopsy)'.
These women have a BREAST BIOPSY REFERRAL OUTCOME National Code of 'Positive; i.e. cancer detected' and a BREAST ASSESSMENT OUTCOME National Code of 'Cancer diagnosed'.
